line.text: %PROFX%For your own safety, you must talk to Angel before you explore this new area of the Savage Land. He has news of a danger that has some chilling propects.
%PLAYER%Okay, Professor Xavier. We'll speak with Angel soon.
line.textb: %PLAYER%Are you always this overprotective of your team, Xavier? Never mind, you don't have to answer. We'll talk to Angel when we see him.
